author: Dave Boyer
title: White House mulling 'war bonds'...
description: White House mulling 'war bonds'... (Second column, 7th story, link ) Related stories: Governments Warned to Coordinate International Virus Response... Spain to Roll Out Basic Income... FT editorial board calls for 'radical reforms' like wealth taxes... GORBAC…
content:
The White House is considering the idea of issuing coronavirus “war bonds” through the Treasury to finance the government’s fight against the pandemic.
White House economic adviser Larry Kudlow said on Monday that he is raising the idea with President Trump … [+1068 chars]
